tests.title: test case: ordered list available
tests.fullTitle: Testing Scholars Project test case: ordered list available
tests.code:
const list = (await driver).findElements(webdriver.By.id('ol'));
assert.notStrictEqual(list.length, 0, 'No ordered list on this page');
